name: ChatDocs: AI-Powered Document Chat Application
desc: AI-powered document chat app with React, Next.js, tRPC backend, LangChain & OpenAI integration, and Stripe-powered subscriptions.

name: Buzz-Chat: Real-Time Web Chat Application
desc: Chat with any user available in the database. Built using ReactJs, ExpressJs , MongoDB, NodeJs , Socket.io and multiAvatarApi(for avatars)

name: SocioPedia - A Social Media App
desc: This is a full stack web application in which user can make friends and upload pictures. This app is built using ReactJs, MongoDB, NodeJs, ExprssJs and MaterialUI

name: Mail-Bot: The Automated Email Reply System
desc: Automated system using Node.js and Google APIs to fetch unread emails and generate smart replies, handling 500+ emails daily with secure OAuth2 authentication.

name: Keeper - Make notes
desc: Build a note making app using ReactJS and used bootstrap for styling the website. In this, User can make note and add notes to the main page.

name: ClimeSky - The Weather App
desc: Made a live Weather Website. Used Open Weather API to weather data. Build using HTML, CSS , JavaScript.
